    • 构造器详细资料

      • CheckingAccount

        CheckingAccount(java.lang.String firstName,
                java.lang.String lastName)
        This constructor initializes one instance of checking account without overdraft protection.
        参数:
        firstName: - the first name of the owner
        lastName: - the last name of the owner

      • CheckingAccount

        CheckingAccount(java.lang.String firstName,
                java.lang.String lastName,
                double protect)
        This constructor initializes one instance of checking account with overdraft protection.
        参数:
        firstName: - the first name of the owner
        lastName: - the last name of the owner
        protect: - overdraft protection

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAccountType

        java.lang.String getAccountType()
        This method returns the account type.
        覆盖:
        getAccountType 在类中 Account
        返回:
        "checking"

      • getOverdraftProtection

        double getOverdraftProtection()
        This method returns the amount of the overdraft.
        返回:
        the amount of the overdraft

      • withdraw

        void withdraw(double amount)
       throws OverdraftException
        This method overrides the Account's. Before the operation comes into effect, it will check whether the balance and overdraft protection is sufficient.
        覆盖:
        withdraw 在类中 Account
        参数:
        amount: - the amount that will be withdrew
        抛出:
        OverdraftException - when the sum of balance and overdraftProtection is less than amt
